title: COII Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Kowloon Tong, Kowloon City) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The processes from apply to getting offer was about one month. Had typical computer test before having interview, 2 interviews in the selection board and asked several questions in eng, cantonese and pth.
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself. Why CityU? About your future Communicate with colleagues in PTH?

title: Teaching Lead Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Starting with self-introduction, the following questions include: how qualified are your programming skills, what is your career plan, and use one word to describe yourself, and ended with group discussions of some cases.
Interview Questions:
Q1:What kind of data analysis do you have experience in? 
Q2:How do you fulfill yourself with this job?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: They will ask about your past experience in research, see if you are capable of their project handling, from experimental skills to data interpretation. They would also ask if you have any questions.
Interview Questions: How does your past experience help you in this research?

title: Finance Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Written test only - a group of 8-10 to finish 3 questions within 20 mins, including self-description, preparation of financial reports and draft a proposal for requesting budget for the department
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Interview by lab director, team manager and senior lab assistant. No written test is required. The whole interview is conducted with English only.  Interviewed for around 20mins. Ask about how the past working experiencemake you fit in the prosition
Interview Questions:
How do you prioritise the task?
What do you expected to gain from the job?
What qualification is needed for the job?

title: Helper Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Interview Process include the self introduction, whether you have any experience in creative media, how to use the cameras, records or something relate to exhibition. Also how you work in a team.
Interview Questions: personality and your work experience in the past

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview with the PI and the PhD students. The PhD students show a presentation regarding their current projects and discuss ideas on how you can possibly contribute to their projects.
Interview Questions: Background, past research experience, research interests, etc.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Get into the lab, Prof was very friendly, introduced a few current staff and talked about what they are doing, provide staff training and the interview was very casual like chatting.
Interview Questions:
English level 
Lab Experience
School Result 
Mainly what you can potentially provide for them

title: Designer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Good and nice interviewer. No much questions and It’s really chill. They just ask previous experience and they give me next level assignment, which is designing. Super duper recommend to apply to there.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Student Helper Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Called in for a chat with the supervisor. Two supervisors will be checking your CV and ask question along the CV. They will describe the job duties and give you time to think about it.
Interview Questions: What do you want to learn from this job? Do you really like the job?

title: Executive Officer II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: 3 hours written test with computers provided. The test was quite hard and there were around 8 candidates. An Interview with 4 panels was held on the same day.  The interview was around 20 minutes.
Interview Questions: Is there any place that you won't go for a business trip?

title: Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: 2 rounds with the department mead, associate head and  subject leader.  Overall, the atmostphere is very friendly and supportive.   The questions are rather basic and general.  It took me about 30mins
Interview Questions: Why you find yourself suitable in teaching this subject? How would you approach the course?

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: written test. part one: word test. just like a normal ACO test. as well as excel test. draft and email for student activity promotion. another question is how to avoid complaint from clients.
Interview Questions: zoom interview during covid-19. but have a setup preparation for an hour and expected you to also take part in that

title: Clerical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Two written tests, 1) email announcement in Chinese 2) email announcement in English Excel test 1) student information 2) program information Interviews in English and Chinese, approximately 10 minutes each.
Interview Questions: 1) career path 2) why do you want to apply for this position in school, but not position in government

title: Teaching Lead Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong
Interview Descriptions: Group interview of 4 candidates, having few case studies and discussion problems to discuss in 15 minutes. And then a 5-minute individual interview asking some personal experiences and skills. There are 4 interviewers in the interview.
Interview Questions: What is my hobby and interests?

title: Business Manager of EMBA School Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Kowloon Tong, Kowloon City) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: interviewed by 3 person - professor, asst. professor and admin. manager.  The male professor always challenged/dissatisfied at your answers (same situation from other applicants) but my replies were very realistic and detail; really don't know what are his perfect answers??  Female Asst. professor and female admin. manager were very friendly.
Interview Questions: How will you recruit more students?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Self-introduction about my education background, research interest, and personality
Technical presentation about my published papers and related research output
Questions and Answers about the technical details
Discussion of the future work plan and some related and potential collaborations
Interview Questions: Technical details about the published papers

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: Ask the working experience and the details on the resume, just the professor himself or herself interviews the candidate. Depends on the requirement of the professor and his research areas, and see whether you are a suitable candidate.
Interview Questions: How do you think yourself distinguish from others

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: I interview with a professor in CityU for the job of a part time research questions. During the interview, some questions are asked as follows: (1) Motivation of application? (2) Plans on Ph.D. application? (3) Research Interest
Interview Questions: (1) Motivation of application? (2) Plans on Ph.D. application? (3) Research Interest

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: interview by telephone, including the research experience, skills, and future plan. I have also introduced my research plan in CityU to make sure we can keep up with good academic performance.
Interview Questions: what kind of skill you have for the mechanical test of the materials, what kind of materials, as well as do you have to develop some advanced method the analysis the fracture behavior. Besides, do you make a presentation in the international conference?

title: Relationship Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Initial Screening: Evaluate qualifications, experience, and suitability for the role Assessment Exercises: Assess writing skills and problem-solving abilities Second Round Interview: Involve more in-depth discussions and assessments and interviewed by a panel of high level professors
Interview Questions: How do you measure and assess the effectiveness of your relationship management efforts? Can you provide examples of key performance indicators you have used in the past?

title: Clerical Officer II Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 week. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Kowloon Tong, Kowloon City) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions:
1. Written Test ( Questions include drafting an Email or letter to professors and students, excel tables concerning program administration)
2. Interview (Face-to-face with three interviewers, 2 teaching staff and 1 admin staff)
Interview Questions:
- Three interviewers ( 2 professors and 1 admin staff)
- Self-introduction
- Career outlook
- Work experience
- Situational questions

title: Clerical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Kowloon Tong, Kowloon City)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed in the summer of 2016. Two interviews were done before I received my offer. Do expect there will be body check for any positions in the Uni. It took around 3 to 4 weeks from the first interviews to the body check and the first day of report duty.
Interview Questions: Briefly introduce yourself (in Eng and PTH)

title: Student Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions:
1) Applied online through the CityU career's site. 
2) Received an email notification about a written test that will be conducted during the in-person interview. 
3) Interview with supervising prof and his secretary + written test
Interview Questions: Are you able to balance multiple tasks at once?

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: Skype interview (video). The committee was composed of 3 people, one of them was my purposed supervisor. The interview was more or less 20 min long in the form of q/a session.
Interview Questions: Why you choose City University of HK?  Which journals do I know in my field? Do I know other people working on my same topic (proposal)?

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: Three people from various functional heads interviewed me, Program leader of Information Management and the Director of Undergrad studies Bachelor of Business Administration program. Another was the program leader of e-Business programme.
Interview Questions: How would you answer the question to students choosing the BBA for Information Systems?

title: Postdoctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview was just with a supervisor and without HR. Long conversation on the research aspects and short one on money. Simply, if they really need you, negotiate as hard as possible. It's good to know the top range for certain position as the local culture is to give at first the lowest possible salary.
Interview Questions: Why would I like to work at CityU?

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Face to face round table interview at the department with potential supervisor and three other AP and professors of the department, took about half an hour to complete. Video interview also available
Interview Questions: My proposed research plans, why HK and cityU, how I address weakness in my CV / background.

title: Program Officer II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: The application process takes around 2 months. They screened some candidates and arranged a written test which is a press release in English and compliant letter response in Chinese. After 2 weeks, there is the first and only face-to-face interview. After 2 weeks, they will give you a call and ask you to do a medical check-up.
Interview Questions: How would you see yourself in five years?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: First, I was contacted by an administrative assistant in human resource center and asked about my available time. Then she arranged an interview for me with my employer. In the interview, my employer spent around 20 minutes interviewing me and he invited another professor to interview me together with some challenging questions. At last, they went out and discuss about the interview for several minutes and went back. The interview ends with some further questions about my visa status.
Interview Questions: Talk about your previous research experience

title: Senior Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very simple. Just an interview with a professor and an EO. Mainstream questions. They just wanted to know your experience and whether you are the right one.The process was smooth. I got an offer tow or three days after the interview, and received a formal letter 1 or 2 weeks afterwards.
Interview Questions: Please describe your duties in your previous jobs.

title: Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at City University of Hong Kong (Hong Kong) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: Initially approached about job after employer found my CV on LinkedIn. This is quite typical for Hong Kong. I sent in materials then had a 45 Skype pre-interview with the Dean. This was then followed by a  very professional two day process in Hong Kong, job talk, interview, tour of campus and tour of potential housing. Met many faculty but no students. Very well hosted, run like typical US academic interview where you give a 30 minute lecture with a 10 minute Q and A to faculty and then have a panel interview with about 5 professors and someone from HRO. Experience was good. Employer met all travel and accommodation costs to fly me to HK.
Interview Questions: What are your research plans?
